paper_abstract: In this note we show that some results of boolean OR-homogeneity of semiconormed fuzzy integrals, which are given by Kim [boolean AND-Homogeneity properties of seminormed fuzzy integrals, Fuzzy Sets and Systems 157(2006) 411-426], are not valid. (C) 2006 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Some notes on boolean OR-homogeneity property of semiconormed fuzzy integrals
